articles.title: Uriah Rennie, Premier League's first Black referee, dies aged 65 as tributes paid to 'trailblazing' official
articles.description: Uriah Rennie broke down barriers as first Black Premier League referee, says Sheffield FA; Rennie took charge of more than 300 matches including 175 Premier League games
articles.content:

articles.title: Singapore’s dengue numbers are down. Should we still be concerned about it?
articles.description: Experts think it may be premature to say if existing measures can curb future outbreaks. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
There were 2,219 dengue cases between January and June 5, compared with the 10,000 cases in the first six months of 2024. PHOTO: ST FILE

articles.title: Fishers find 37 packs of ‘shabu,’ this time in Ilocos Sur
articles.description: Fishers found two more sacks containing 37 packs of “shabu” (crystal meth), this time in the waters of Santa Cruz, Ilocos Sur.
articles.content:
TUGUEGARAO CITY, CAGAYAN, Philippines — Fishers found two more sacks containing 37 packs of “shabu” (crystal meth), this time in the waters of Santa Cruz, Ilocos Sur, on Saturday, with an estimated total value of P231.2 million.

articles.description: Planning permission sought from Louth County Council
articles.content:

articles.title: Porsche 963 RSP: Le Mans race car turned into road-going hypercar
articles.description: The Porsche 963 race car has been turned into a road-legal car of sorts, and made its debut ahead of this week's 24 Hours of Le Mans.
articles.content:
Porsche has a new hypercar based on its Le Mans Daytona hybrid (LMDh) class race car, but it’s just a one off.
